name: Jeepney Simulator
description:
OVERVIEW

Drive through the busy streets of Dabbo City on iconic Filipino jeepneys. Pick up passengers, return their change, and drop them off at their destination. Use your hard-earned income to feed your family, buy furniture, and pay your rent. Or spend it on upgrades and customization options for your jeeps.

IMMSERSIVE GAMEPLAY


Take a walk to the garage, push the engine button, and switch your gear! Become the jeepney driver!

CUSTOMIZATION


Upgrade your jeepney's speed, fuel efficiency, and fuel capacity. Paint it to one of many colors. Golden jeepney, anyone?

REALISTIC TRAFFIC SYSTEM


Navigate the busy streets and weave through traffic!

FAMILY MANAGEMENT


Manage your family's health and happiness by interacting with them, buying furniture, and picking the right choices in randomized events!

HIRAYA CORPORATION


Discover the secrets of a megacorporation as it slowly starts to take over the country...
